021import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
026import net.tnemc.core.api.response.AccountAPIResponse;
027import net.tnemc.core.channel.SyncHandler;
028import net.tnemc.core.config.DataConfig;
029import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
030import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
031import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
032import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
033import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
034import net.tnemc.core.transaction.history.AwayHistory;
035import net.tnemc.core.utils.MISCUtils;
036import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
037import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
038import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreExecution;
039import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreTime;
040import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.UUIDPair;
041import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
042import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.HandlerResponse;
043
044import java.util.Date;
045import java.util.Optional;
046import java.util.UUID;
047
048/**
049 * Represents an event where a player is joining.
050 *
051 * @author creatorfromhell
052 * @since 0.1.2
053 */
054public class PlayerJoinHandler {
055
056  /**
057   * Used to handle a PlayerJoinEvent using the specified {@link PlayerProvider} class.
058   *
059   * @param provider The {@link PlayerProvider} associated with the platform event.
060   *
061   * @return True if the event should be cancelled, otherwise false.
062   */
063  public HandlerResponse handle(final PlayerProvider provider, final String serverIP, final int serverPort) {
064
065    final HandlerResponse response = new HandlerResponse("", false);
066
067    PluginCore.log().debug("Player Join ID: " + provider.identifier());
068
069    //we have to hardcode this UUID since MoDispenserMechanics fires the join event with their fake player....
070    if(provider.identifier().toString().equalsIgnoreCase("657912a8-aa0e-3f17-aff5-a41f440e710c")) {
071      return response;
072    }
073
074    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(provider.identifier());
075
076    boolean firstJoin = false;
077    AccountAPIResponse apiResponse = null;
078
079    PluginCore.log().debug("Join Account Check: " + account.isPresent());
080
081    //Our account doesn't exist, so now we need to continue from here
082    if(account.isEmpty()) {
083      firstJoin = true;
084
085      apiResponse = TNECore.eco().account().createAccount(provider.identifier().toString(),
086                                                          provider.getName());
087
088      PluginCore.log().debug("API Join Check. Account Exists: " + apiResponse.getAccount().isPresent());
089      if(apiResponse.getAccount().isEmpty()) {
090        response.setResponse(response.getResponse());
091        response.setCancelled(true);
092        return response;
093      } else {
094        if(!apiResponse.getResponse().success() && apiResponse.getAccount().isPresent()) {
095          firstJoin = false;
096        }
097      }
098    }
099
100    PluginCore.log().debug("First Join: " + firstJoin);
101
102    final Optional<Account> acc = (apiResponse == null)? account :
103                                  apiResponse.getAccount();
104
105    final UUID id = provider.identifier();
106    if(acc.isPresent()) {
107
108      if(!acc.get().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(provider.getName())) {
109        acc.get().setName(provider.getName());
110
111        TNECore.eco().account().uuidProvider().store(new UUIDPair(provider.identifier(), provider.getName()));
112      }
113
114      if(firstJoin || acc.get().getCreationDate() == ((PlayerAccount)acc.get()).getLastOnline()) {
115
116        final String region = TNECore.eco().region().getMode().region(provider);
117        for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
118
119          if(currency.type().supportsItems() && MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Server.ImportItems", true)) {
120
121            TNECore.eco().account().getImporting().add(id);
122
123            for(final HoldingsEntry entry : acc.get().getHoldings(region, currency.getUid())) {
124
125              acc.get().setHoldings(entry, entry.getHandler());
126            }
127
128            TNECore.eco().account().getImporting().remove(id);
129            continue;
130          }
131
132          PluginCore.log().debug("Setting Balance to Starting Holdings Currency: " + currency.getIdentifier());
133
134          if(firstJoin) {
135            acc.get().setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(region,
136                                                    currency.getUid(),
137                                                    currency.getStartingHoldings(),
138                                                    EconomyManager.NORMAL
139            ));
140          }
141        }
142      } else {
143        TNECore.eco().account().getLoading().add(id);
144
145        final String region = TNECore.eco().region().getMode().region(provider);
146        for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().getCurrencies(region)) {
147
148          if(currency instanceof final ItemCurrency itemCurrency) {
149
150            if(!acc.get().getWallet().contains(region, currency.getUid())) {
151
152              if(itemCurrency.isImportItem()) {
153
154                TNECore.eco().account().getImporting().add(id);
155
156                for(final HoldingsEntry entry : acc.get().getHoldings(region, currency.getUid())) {
157
158                  acc.get().setHoldings(entry, entry.getHandler());
159                }
160
161                TNECore.eco().account().getImporting().remove(id);
162              } else {
163                acc.get().setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(region,
164                                                        currency.getUid(),
165                                                        currency.getStartingHoldings(),
166                                                        EconomyManager.NORMAL
167                ));
168              }
169            } else {
170
171              for(final HoldingsEntry entry : acc.get().getHoldings(region, currency.getUid())) {
172
173                acc.get().setHoldings(entry, entry.getHandler());
174              }
175            }
176          }
177        }
178      }
179      TNECore.eco().account().getLoading().remove(id);
180
181      PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(()->{
182
183        final Optional<AwayHistory> away = acc.get().away(((PlayerAccount)acc.get()).getUUID());
184        if(away.isPresent()) {
185          provider.message(new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.AwayJoin"));
186        }
187
188      }, new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
189
190      if(provider.hasPermission("tne.admin.update")) {
191        if(MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Update.Notify") && TNECore.instance().update() != null) {
192
193          if(TNECore.instance().update().needsUpdate()) {
194            provider.message(new MessageData("<red>[TNE] Update Available! Latest: <white>" + TNECore.instance().update().getBuild()));
195          }
196
197          if(TNECore.instance().update().isEarlyBuild()) {
198            provider.message(new MessageData("<gold>[TNE] Thank You for testing this pre-release version!"));
199          }
200        }
201
202
203        if(TNECore.eco().transaction().isTrack()) {
204          //TODO: Any warnings? Balance jumps?
205        }
206      }
207
208      //If this is the first player online, sync balances.
209      if(PluginCore.server().onlinePlayers() == 1) {
210        //check if server own wants db reloaded
211        if(DataConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Data.Sync.Reload.Enabled", false)) {
212
213          if(MISCUtils.isTimeDifferenceGreaterOrEqual(new Date(TNECore.eco().getReloadTime()), DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Sync.Reload.Time", 120))) {
214
215            TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().clear();
216            TransactionManager.receipts().getReceipts().clear();
217
218            TNECore.instance().storage().loadAll(Account.class, "");
219            TNECore.instance().storage().loadAll(Receipt.class, "");
220
221            TNECore.eco().setReloadTime(new Date().getTime());
222          }
223        } else {
224          SyncHandler.send(acc.get().getIdentifier().toString(), acc.get().getName(), serverIP, serverPort);
225        }
226      }
227    }
228    return response;
229  }
230}
